text: The Cable Music Channel (CMC) was a short-lived American basic cable channel. It was owned by the Turner Broadcasting System. ==Related pages== * MOR Music TV * Night Tracks * Ted Turner * The Tube Music Network == Other websites == * Cable Music Channel TV ad * Cable Music Channel's sign on & first few minutes * Archive.org: 3 hours of Cable Music Channel (first hour, typical hour and final hour) Category:Defunct companies of the United States Category:1984 establishments in the United States Category:1984 disestablishments in the United States
title: Cable Music Channel
